name: Drifty (GreenM4x)
description:
Drifty Description

The Game concept is simple. You have one track, if you get off you will get reset to the start of it. Now try to finish one Round and then break the record!

Extra Info

Ye the concept isn't new, but for the 8 year old me it was so back then i made a game like this in Scratch but now I wanted to make my past me pround and remake the Idear, maybe not it good but in better!

Gl and Have fun!
